title: Trump picks Brad Parscale to manage 2020 re-election
text:
Trump picks Brad Parscale to manage 2020 re-election Tuesday, February 27, 2018 - 01:13 
President Donald Trump on Tuesday named political strategist Brad Parscale as manager of his 2020 presidential re-election campaign, rewarding a digital expert who was critical to Trump’s 2016 victory and who is trusted by the Trump family.   
President Donald Trump on Tuesday named political strategist Brad Parscale as manager of his 2020 presidential re-election campaign, rewarding a digital expert who was critical to Trump’s 2016 victory and who is trusted by the Trump family.  //reut.rs/2EXZShV
